title.fr: Étude des systèmes de refroidissement des glaciers
title.it: Studio sui sistemi di raffreddamento dei ghiacciai

summary.en: Requesting research, funding reports and data on passive and active glacier‑cooling methods over the past five years, including techniques like reflective covers, artificial snowmaking and shading.
summary.fr: Analyse des mesures de refroidissement passives et actives des glaciers.
summary.it: Analisi delle misure di raffreddamento passive e attive dei ghiacciai.

request_text: Please provide all documentation on glacier‑cooling research funded in the last five years, including studies on passive and active techniques such as reflective blankets, artificial snowmaking and shading.
response_text: Attached are the funding reports and research datasets for the requested glacier‑cooling projects.

summary.en: Requesting environmental impact assessments, planning documents and public consultation reports for high‑altitude photovoltaic projects since 2023; the response provides the impact‑assessment summary and anonymised public comments.
summary.de: Anfrage nach Umweltprüfungen für alpine Solaranlagen.
summary.fr: Demande de documents concernant les évaluations environnementales pour les installations solaires alpines.
summary.it: Richiesta di documenti sulle valutazioni ambientali per gli impianti solari alpini.

request_text: Please provide all environmental impact assessments, planning documents and public consultations related to high-altitude photovoltaic projects since 2023.
response_text: Enclosed you will find the impact‑assessment summary and anonymised records of public comments.
